Modification_Detail.description: Table contains a record for each analyte result from each analysis for each sample. Massively denormalized because it is designed for a search index, not data management.

Internal_Reference.comment: analytical data is joined to astro_sample_t for additional information on the sample; sample.id --> sample_id

Header.name: Column Headings
Header.description: Comma-separated names of columns in the data table.

Field_Delimited.name: sample_data_id
Field_Delimited.description: field identifier generated by ElasticSearch. 20 character string, character set: 0-9,a-z, A-Z, _ , -

Field_Delimited.name: analysisActionNum
Field_Delimited.description: numeric foreign key to astro_analysis_action_t table, to provide details about the analysis action

Field_Delimited.name: analysisActionDescription
Field_Delimited.description: Description of analysis action, duplicates content from analysis action table, included for convienence

Field_Delimited.name: analysisComment
Field_Delimited.description: additional information specific to this particular analytic result

Field_Delimited.name: analysisType
Field_Delimited.description: controlled vocabulary. values: {Inclusion Analysis, Mineral Analysis, Rock Analysis}

Field_Delimited.name: analyzedMaterialCode
Field_Delimited.description: Controlled vocabulary, values: {CHONDRULE, CLAST, GLASS, GM, INC, INTERSTITIAL, LE, MATRIX, MESO, MIN, PRESOLAR GRAIN, RESIDUE, SEPARATE, WR}

Field_Delimited.name: analyzedMaterialName
Field_Delimited.description: controlled vocabulary, {CHONDRULE, CLAST, GLASS, GROUNDMASS, INCLUSION, INTERSTITIAL, LEACHATE, MATRIX, MESOSTASIS, MINERAL, PRESOLAR GRAIN, RESIDUE, SEPARATE, WHOLE ROCK} matches to MaterialCode list

Field_Delimited.name: calcAvg
Field_Delimited.description: values: {Can be avaraged, Cannot be averaged It is avaraged, It is average}

Field_Delimited.name: citation.citationNum
Field_Delimited.description: numeric identifier, FK to astro_citation_t.csv

Field_Delimited.name: citation.id
Field_Delimited.description: random text string identifier, FK to astro_citation_t.csv

Field_Delimited.name: dataset.datasetCode
Field_Delimited.description: code identifier for dataset that reported this analytic result

Field_Delimited.name: dataset.datasetNum
Field_Delimited.description: numeric foreign key to astro_dataset_t datasetNum to join to dataset table

Field_Delimited.name: dataset.id
Field_Delimited.description: random 20 character string foreign key to astro_dataset_t datasetNum to join to dataset table

Field_Delimited.name: grain
Field_Delimited.description: values: {AN, AO, AOP, AP, BL, BLS, CC, CP, ECH, EH, FE, FM, GB, GC, GM, GRB, HA, HO, IA, IG, IN, INT, IO, IOX, LL, MC, MLP, PC, VE, XC}

Field_Delimited.name: heated
Field_Delimited.description: values: {C, R}

Field_Delimited.name: inclusionMineral
Field_Delimited.description: values {AM-SI, AN, APA, ARMA, AUG, BZT, chrom, CPX, CR-MT, DI, EN, FAYALITE, FENI METAL, FORSTERITE, GL, GM, GROSSITE, GROSSULAR, HIBONITE, ILM, INT METAL, KF, MASKELYNITE, MELILITE, MERRILLITE, MESO, MSS, MT, NEPH, NI METAL, OL, OPX, PENT, PLAG, PX, PY, PYRH, RUT, SLFI, SP, TI-MT, TRO, ULSP, WHT, ZIRKELITE}

Field_Delimited.name: inclusionSize
Field_Delimited.description: inclusion size in mm, ranges from 1 to 3.2 mm

Field_Delimited.name: inclusionType
Field_Delimited.description: controlled vocabulary: {Cr SPINEL,CRYSTALLINE, GLASS.MINERAL}

Field_Delimited.name: hostMineral
Field_Delimited.description: values: {AUG, CPX, Fe METAL, ILM, MASKELYNITE, OL, OPX, PLAG, PX, PYX, SLFI, SYMP, TRO}

Field_Delimited.name: hostRock
Field_Delimited.description: not clear how this field is being used. values inclue {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, OL} and a set of {OL, Fo xx.xx} pairs with Fo values (xx.xx) ranging from 46.51 to 75.34

Field_Delimited.name: methodName
Field_Delimited.description: label for analytical method used to obtain result value. 72 different methods reported.

Field_Delimited.name: mineralName
Field_Delimited.description: name of mineral used to obtain result value. 86 different minerals reported.

Field_Delimited.name: mineralSize
Field_Delimited.description: not clear how this field is being used, values include integers, decimal numbers with units (mm or micro), and other text

Field_Delimited.name: numberOfReplicates
Field_Delimited.description: number of replicates; likely values range from 1 to 1000; other text strings are present.

Field_Delimited.name: rimOrCore
Field_Delimited.description: rimOrCore

Field_Delimited.name: sample.id
Field_Delimited.description: foreign key to astro_sample_t sample_id

Field_Delimited.name: sample.sampleCode
Field_Delimited.description: code identifier for the analyzed sample

Field_Delimited.name: sample.sampleName
Field_Delimited.description: label for the analyzed sample

Field_Delimited.name: sample.sampleNum
Field_Delimited.description: alternate foreign key to astro_sample_t sampleNum

Field_Delimited.name: spotId
Field_Delimited.description: identifier for a microprobe analyzed spot, essentially a sub sample of the sample identified by sample.id

Field_Delimited.name: stdevType
Field_Delimited.description: identifier for kind of statistical method used to determine sample deviation. values: {%, 1S, 1S-ABS, 2S, 2S-ABS, ABS, None, REL, S, S-ABS, S-REL}

Field_Delimited.name: stdevDefinition
Field_Delimited.description: text label/definition for the standard deviation type. values: {percent , one sigma (one standard deviation), one sigma (one sigma (one standard deviation) absolute), two sigma (two standard deviations), two sigma (two standard deviations), absolute, absolute error (standard error or deviation unspecified), relative, standard deviation (sigma level and relative/absolute unspecified), absolute standard deviation (sigma level unspecified), relative standard deviation, sigma level unspecified}

Field_Delimited.name: stdevValue
Field_Delimited.description: standard deviation value for the reported value on this analyte

Field_Delimited.name: temperature
Field_Delimited.description: not clear how this field is being used, values {NO, YES}

Field_Delimited.name: unit
Field_Delimited.description: units of measure identifer string for the reported value values: {%, at%, cc/g, ccstp/g, dpm/g, dpm/kg, Ga, Î¼g g-1, Î¼g/g, ka, Ma, mg/cm3, mg/g, mol%, mol/g, ng/g, nmol/g, Not Applicable, per mil, per mil SMOW, pg/g, pmol/g, ppb, ppm, ppt, vol%, wt%}

Field_Delimited.name: value
Field_Delimited.description: reported analysis result for this analyte (variable)

Field_Delimited.name: variable
Field_Delimited.description: analyte property for which the value is reported; 440 different variables reported

Field_Delimited.name: variableDefinition
Field_Delimited.description: text definition of the reported variable

Field_Delimited.name: variableGroup
Field_Delimited.description: Category for grouping variable typically related to a single analysis. values {AGE, EM, IR, IS, MAJ, MODE, NGAS, REE, TE, US, VO}

Field_Delimited.name: variableGroupDefinition
Field_Delimited.description: text explanation of the variable group. Values {Age, End-Member, Radiogenic_Isotopes, Stable_Isotopes, Major_Oxide/Element, Rock_Mode, Noble_Gas, Rare_Earth_Element, Trace_Element, Uranium_Series, Volatile}
